page.title: 05AUTOMOTIVE ENGINEER
page.content: Dad goes to work at 8.20am, starts work at 8.30am, goes on the road at 10.15am and comes home at 5.00pm. He is a Sales Representative for Automotive Diesel Electrical Services Ltd, who sell auto electrical and diesel parts. His manager is Mr Jack Archer and there are 15 more work people at the Chesterfield branch. A.D.E.S.Ltd. has two other branches in Sheffield and Scunthorpe. It is about four miles to his work place and he goes by car which is a Vauxhall Astra car 1600. He enjoys driving and meeting people. He likes the people he works with because they work as a team. He travels about 100 miles a day to Clay Cross, Mansfield, Worksop and Staveley.He sells approx. Â£14,000 of goods in a month to Stores Managers, Haulage Owners and Plant Manager.
